statements: UPDATE Faculty SET faculty_name='Professor John', teaching_schedule='MWF 8-10am', research_interests='Machine Learning' WHERE faculty_id=1;
UPDATE Faculty SET research_interests='Database Management', faculty_name='Professor Jane', teaching_schedule='TTh 1-3pm' WHERE faculty_id=2;
UPDATE Faculty SET faculty_name='John Doe', teaching_schedule='Monday to Friday', research_interests='Machine Learning' WHERE faculty_id=1;
UPDATE Faculty SET research_interests='Artificial Intelligence', faculty_name='Jane Smith', teaching_schedule='Tuesday and Thursday' WHERE faculty_id=3;
UPDATE Faculty SET research_interests = 'Machine Learning' WHERE faculty_id = 101;
UPDATE Teaching_Schedule SET room_number = '203B', time_of_day = '14:00:00' WHERE faculty_id = 102 AND course_name = 'Database Management';
UPDATE Faculty SET research_interests = 'Machine Learning, Data Science' WHERE faculty_id = 101
